subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Corey Hart’s two-run home run with two outs off reliever Ryota Igarashi stopped the Mets’ winning streak at five games and their shutout streak at 35 innings.
snippet: Corey Hart’s two-run home run with two outs off reliever Ryota Igarashi stopped the Mets’ winning streak at five games and their shutout streak at 35 innings.
